entry.title: DelicateSkin‚Ñ¢ Portable Chin Neckline Massager
entry.summary:
Vendor: BloomVenus
Type:
Price: 29.99

Product Description:

Having a double chin is often associated with weight gain, but a person doesn't have to be obese to have one. It may also be genetics and a result of aging. If you're one of those who struggle with having a double chin, there's an excellent face slimming device that could actually solve your problem ‚Äî DelicateSkin‚Ñ¢ Portable Chin Neckline Massager!

This revolutionary device designed to eliminate a double chin, thus helping you achieve the face shape you desire. It features three different strength springs (low, medium, and high) that produce different massage effect. From beginner to advanced toning, for rapid results.

Aside from double chin, DelicateSkin‚Ñ¢ Portable Chin Neckline Massager is also effective in firming your neck and cheeks ‚Äî without going under the knife or taking pills.

This facial beauty tool is not only suitable for women but also perfect for men who deal with a double chin.¬†

  • Mini and stylish appearance
  • Convenient to carry
  • Gives dramatic results in just 2 minutes a day
  • Ideal beauty facial tool

How to Use:

GIF

Step 1: Hold the device in your dominant hand.

Step 2: Place the bottom of the facial massager against your chest up to your collarbone.

Step 3: Rest the area behind your chin onto the gray padding of the pump.

Step 4: Bring your head down, like you're nodding. Do it slowly while holding the device in place.¬†

Step 5: Bring your chin down to press the pump down into the facial massager.

Step 6: Press down slowly and firmly as you feel some resistance, focusing on your neck muscles.

*Repeat this process for two minutes a day, 15 to 20 times a minute.

How to install spring?

GIF

Step 1: Choose the spring that as per your requirement (pink: low, green: medium, or purple: high).

Step 2: Unlock the chin pad by twisting the gold locking ring in a counter-clockwise position. The chin pad will pop up, keep twisting the gold ring until it "clicks" into the unlocked position.

Step 3: Once it is unlocked, you can insert the spring.

Step 4: To lock the chin pad in the down position, depress the chin pad fully and twist the gold locking ring in a clockwise direction until it "clicks" into the locked position.¬†

Specifications:

Item weight: 0.21 lbs. (93 grams)

Item size: 136 * 5.6 * 4.2cm

Include:

1 x Neckline Slimmer

1 x Carry Bag

3 x Springs¬†

1 x Instruction Manual¬†¬†

Note:

  • The color of the product shown in the pictures may slightly vary from the actual item due to the differences in the monitor and light effect.
  • Please allow slight measuring deviation due to manual measurement.

With this product, getting a firmer, attractive, and sexy body shape is possible with the convenience and comfort of your home.

How to Use:

Step 2: Paste the slimming patch on the clean and dry navel (legs or arms), then fixed the adhesive.

Step 3: Use one piece per day, for 12-24 hours in the course of one month. *For better results, try a two-month course.

  • Do not use the product if you are pregnant, breastfeeding or suffer from skin allergies.

Product Description:

Many individuals are dealing with fat gain due to the sedentary lifestyle most people have these days. The problem is not all are able to hit the gym or do some exercises at home due to a tight schedule. At this point, our Shape-It-Right‚Ñ¢ Body Slimming Massager is a perfect solution!

3 TECHNOLOGIES: This revolutionary body slimming device uses three technologies (EMS, Infrared, and Ultrasonic) which help in burning fat on certain body parts, and also has 5 different EMS modes and 2 sonic vibration levels.

IMPROVED SKIN: The use of sonic vibration and LED infrared promote helps in dissolution of fats, which in turns accelerate metabolism and regenerate skin elasticity for better-looking skin.

1M ULTRASONIC VIBRATIONS PER SEC: It produces 1 million ultrasonic vibrations per second which activate the cells and skin and help reduce the appearance of wrinkles.

STIMULATE THE MUSCLES: EMS can stimulate the muscles and¬† acupuncture points, which relaxes muscle spasms and increases local blood circulation.

    MASSAGING & RELAXING: In addition to accelerating the consumption of fats, it can also help with severe chronic back pain and other forms of body aches.

    How to Use:

    Step 1: Clean the skin before use and dry it.

    Step 4: Use red light function and high-frequency vibration to select the mode according to the thickness of the skin.

    • Do not use EMS on your face!

    Note:

    • Stop using if you feel any irritation.
    • Please be guided that patients, pregnant women, and the cardiac patient should not use this product.
